title: President Signs Special Inspector General for the Troubled Asset Relief Program Act of 2009 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




April 24, 2009

 



President Signs Special Inspector General for the Troubled Asset Relief Program Act of 2009




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  _______________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                       April 24, 2009    On Friday, April 24, 2009, the President signed into law:   S. 383, the "Special Inspector General for the Troubled Asset Relief Program Act of 2009," which provides the Office of the Special Inspector General for the Troubled Asset Relief Program with additional authorities and responsibilities.
